thread.section_title: Medical Design Technology | The Medical Design Engineer’s Resource for Products & Technologies
thread.title: Contract Manufacturing in MedTech

author: Larry Corby, Digital Artist
title: Contract Manufacturing in MedTech
text: As more medical device OEMs seek contract manufacturing for tasks that are not part of the company’s core competencies, we were interested in seeing what types of services were most often being used, the perception of quality with those services, and how much the services are being used compared to the past and predicted for the future.
